posts.post_title: WTB: T207 Napoleon backs and Anon Fact. 3
posts.post_content:
Looking for any T207 Napoleons, especially Yankee players

Also looking for Anon Factory backs of either Duffy Lewis or Rollie Zeider or any blank backed Yankees



Please send scans to [url]XxSeiklis_GrockxX@hotmail.com[/url] or pm me with offers

Thanks for looking
